Banking options available for South Africans

Online casinos offer a variety of methods for you to easily fund your casino account. These options range from credit and debit cards to various online payment e-wallets such as Skrill and Neteller. There are also instant EFT options available which allow you to make immediate payments to your casino account.

Each of our casino reviews will indicate the choices on offer by various casinos. All casinos listed on the site are ZAR friendly, this means they accept the local South African currency (Rand) and you can deposit and cashout winnings in Rand.
